Verses: 1 karththaave, Ummode Naan Vazhakkaadapponaal, Dhevareer Needhiyullavaraame; Aagilum Ummudaiya Nyaayangalaik Kuriththu Ummode Naan Pesumpadi Vendugiren; Aagaadhavargalin Vazhi Vaaikkiradhenna? Dhrogancheydhuvarugira Anaivarum Sugiththirukkiradhenna?
2 neer Avargalai Naattineer, Verpatrith Theripponaargal, Kaniyum Kodukkiraargal; Neer Avargal Vaaikku Sameebamum, Avargal Ullindhiriyangalukko Dhooramumaayirukkireer.

3 karththaave, Neer Ennai Arindhirukkireer, Ennaik Kaangireer; En Irudhayam Umakku Munbaaga Eppadippattadhendru Sodhiththu Arigireer; Adikkappadum Aadugalaippola Avargalaip Pidungippottu Kolainaalukku Avargalai Niyamiyum.
4 endhamattum Dhesam Pulambi, Ellaa Veliyin Pullum Vaadi, Adhin Kudigaludaiya Pollaappinimiththam Mirugangalum Paravaigalum Azhiyavendum! Engal Mudivai Avan Kaanbadhillaiyengiraargal.

5 nee Kaalaatkalode Odumpodhe Unnai Ilaikkappanninaargalaanaal, Kudhiraigalode Eppadi Serndhu Oduvaai? Samaadhaanamulla Dhesaththileye Nee Adaikkalam Thedinaal, Yordhaan Pravaagiththu Varumpodhu Nee Ennaseyvaai?

6 un Sagodhararum, Un Thagappanvamsaththaarum Unakku Dhrogampanni, Avargalum Unnaip Pinthodarndhu Migavum Aaravaarampanninaargal; Avargal Unnode Iniya Vaarththaigalaip Pesinaalum Avargalai Nambavendaam.
7 naan En Veettai Vittuvitten, En Sudhandharaththai Negizhavitten; En Aaththumaa Nesiththavalai Avanudaiya Saththuruvin Kaiyile Oppukkoduththen.
8 en Sudhandharam Kaattilulla Singaththaippola Enakkaayitru: Adhu Enakku Virodhamaai Kerchchikkiradhu; Aadhalaal Adhai Verukkiren.
9 en Sudhandharam Palavarunamaana Patchiyaippola Enakkaayitru; Aagaiyaal, Patchigal Adhai Sutrilum Varuvadhaaga; Veliyil Sagala Jeevangale Adhaip Patchikkumpadi Koodivaarungal.
10 anega Meyppargal En Dhraatchaththottaththai Azhiththu, En Pangaik Kaalaal Midhiththu, En Piriyamaana Pangaip Paazhaana Vanaandharamaakkinaargal.
11 adhaip Paazhaakkivittaargal; Paazhaaik Kidakkira Adhu Ennai Nokkip Pulambugiradhu; Dhesamellaam Paazhaayitru; Oruvanum Adhai Manadhile Vaikkiradhillai.

12 kollaikkaarar Vanaandharaththilulla Ellaa Uyarnilangalinmelum Varugiraargal; Karththarudaiya Pattayam Dhesaththin Orumunaithodangi Dhesaththin Marumunaimattum Patchiththukkondirukkum; Maamsamaagiya Ondrukkum Samaadhaanamillai.
13 kodhumaiyai Vidhaiththaargal, Mullugalai Aruppaargal; Prayaasappaduvaargal, Prayojanamadaiyaargal; Karththarudaiya Ukkirakobaththinaal Ungalukku Varumpalanaikkuriththu Vetkappadungal.

14 idho Naan En Janamaagiya Isravelukkuk Kaaniyaatchiyaagakkoduththa En Sudhandharaththaith Thodugira Dhushtaraana Ayalaar Anaivaraiyum Thangal Dhesaththil Iraadhapadikkup Pidungippoduven Endru, Karththar Avargalaikkuriththu Sollugiraar; Yoodhaa Vamsaththaaraiyum Avargal Naduvil Iraadhapadikkup Pidungippoduven.
15 avargalai Naan Pidungippottapirpaadu, Naan Thirumbavum Avargalmel Irangi, Avargalaith Thangal Thangal Sudhandharaththukkum Thangal Thangal Boomikkum Thirumbappannuven.

16 appuram Avargal En Janaththukkup Paagaalinmel Aanaiyidak Katrukkoduththadhupola, Karththarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Endru Solli, En Naamaththinmel Aanaiyidumpadi En Janaththin Vazhigalai Nandraaik Katrukkondaal, Avargal En Janaththin Naduvile Oondrakkattappaduvaargal.
17 kelaargaleyaagil, Naan Appadippatta Jaadhiyai Verode Pidungippottu Azhiththuviduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
